meta.name: description
meta.content: Universal Family of Schools is a group of schools in Philadelphia, PA that includes Universal Alcorn Elementary. We encourage parents of our students to be more involved in our programs to assist our teachers in providing quality education. Get in touch with us to learn more about our schools.

Universal Family of Schools is a group of schools in Philadelphia, PA that includes Universal Alcorn Elementary. We encourage parents of our students to be more involved in our programs to assist our teachers in providing quality education. Get in touch with us to learn more about our schools.

div.class: fl-row fl-row-full-width fl-row-bg-color fl-node-5e6e9b6becf69 fl-row-custom-height fl-row-align-center

b.u: All Universal Schools Closed Until Further Notice

p.span: Governor Wolf announced that all schools will remain closed until further notice as they work to mitigate the spread of COVID-19 and protect the health of all Pennsylvanians. Thank you for your patience through these uncertain and constantly evolving circumstances.

span.span: Please read the most recent letter from Dr. Penny Nixon

p.span: Grab-and-go meal sites continue to operate for our students. Updated locations and times are HERE.

K-12 Remote Learning Packets continue to be available on each Universal School's site. It is our hope that all students in the City of Philadelphia will engage in learning activities during this very difficult time.
Find your school HERE or more activities HERE.

div.span: Please visit the Coronavirus Information Hub often for the most up-to-date information, as it becomes available.
Thank you for flexibility and understanding during this difficult time. Please stay safe.

article.class: fl-post post-22 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.class: fl-row fl-row-full-width fl-row-bg-photo fl-node-5c475d3ce55ed fl-row-custom-height fl-row-align-center fl-row-bg-overlay

div.p: We miss you all very much and hope you all are navigating through these challenging times!

Due to the COVID-19 outbreak Universal Alcorn has had to transformed the traditional school setting to REMOTE learning from home. In the next week you will hear from your scholar’s teacher regarding how the remote learning will look for your scholar’s grade.
Good luck and feel free to reach out to your child’s teacher if you have any questions regarding the below listed work.

a.span: Universal Alcorn Continuity of Education Plan

br.a: Text: Our World In Space Part 1
Text: Our World in Space Part 2

p.a: G3 Sci Life Cycles and Organisms and their Environment
G4 Sci Plan Structure and Function
G8 Sci - History of Life on Earth & Evolution

h2.span: Connecting Parents and Schools to Increase Achievement

div.p: We encourage you to participate in one of the many opportunities such as the Home and School Association, School Advisory Councils (SAC) and/or volunteer as a teacher assistant/aide, food pantry worker, or just read to our preschoolers.
For more information, contact the Universal Alcorn Charter Elementary School at (215) 952-6219 or send us an email.

h2.span: Universal Alcorn Charter Elementary School News

p.a: Penny Nixon on Board to Oversee PHL Pre-K

a.p:
Corporate Office
800 S. 15th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19146

Central Education Office
1427 Catharine Street, 5th Floor
Philadelphia, PA 19146

div.p: The Universal Education mission is to provide a rich and high quality education for every scholar to prepare them for college, technical school, entrepreneurships that leads to a sustainable career in the 21st century and build altruistic alumni who contribute to the transformation of their communities as future leaders and positive members of society.
